title: President Obama Announces Presidential Delegation to the Republic of Chile to Attend the Inauguration of Her Excellency Michelle Bachelet | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House
Office of the Press Secretary


For Immediate Release
March 07, 2014

 



President Obama Announces Presidential Delegation to the Republic of Chile to Attend the Inauguration of Her Excellency Michelle Bachelet




President Barack Obama today announced the designation of a Presidential Delegation to the Republic of Chile to attend the Inauguration of Her Excellency Michelle Bachelet on March 11, 2014.
The Honorable Joseph R. Biden, Jr., Vice President of the United States, will lead the delegation.
Members of the Presidential Delegation:
The Honorable Michael A. Hammer, United States Ambassador to the Republic of Chile
The Honorable Roberta S. Jacobson, Assistant Secretary of State for Western Hemisphere Affairs
